mapper.sql: id, mission, mtype, mstatus, createtime, updatetime, creator, rank, startdate, enddate
mapper.insert: insert into mission (id, mission, mtype, mstatus, createtime, updatetime, creator, rank, startdate, enddate) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startdate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enddate,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update mission
mission = #{mission,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update mission set mission = #{mission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mtype = #{mtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mstatus = #{mstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rank = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, startdate = #{startdate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enddate = #{enddate,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from mission where startdate <= #{date,jdbcType=BIGINT} and enddate >= #{date,jdbcType=BIGINT} and mstatus = 0
